app_descript:
MSB Parent, USA

Brief: MSB Parent, USA is an essential mobile application specifically designed for parents in the United States, providing a secure and efficient platform to manage important information related to their children's schooling needs. This tool helps parents stay connected and informed about their students' academic journey by allowing them to easily upload and store photos, as well as recover account details via SMS.

Core Features:

  • üì∏ Photo Uploads: Capture and upload photos of your student directly through the app.
  • üíæ Data Storage: Conveniently store student photos and essential crash log data for easy access.
  • üì≤ Account Recovery: Utilize phone and SMS permissions for hassle-free username and password recovery.
  • üîí Privacy-Focused: Strict permissions ensure your data remains confidential and secure.
  • üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüë¶ Parental Control: Keep full control over the management of your student's academic details.

  • üõ†Ô∏è Intuitive Recovery Options: In case of lost account information, recovery is simple and secure.
